message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $110?
I understand where you're coming from, Bob, but I'm not quite comfortable with $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though! How about we compromise at $115?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $112?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. How about we meet at $114?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm getting close to my limit, but I'd like to try to squeeze out a bit more. Would you be willing to go down to $111?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $113?
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $113 and my previous offer of $111. How about we meet at $112?
